data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Humans are physiological beings that require food, rest, and water to survive. As ____ beings ____ to ____ the ____ of ____ workplace, ____ have ____ free ____ for ____ and ____. If ____ are ____ to ____ a restful ____ relaxing ____ environment, ____ performance ____ increase ____. Employers, therefore, are in need of effective strategies to promote employee wellbeing and to reduce absenteeism due to stress from the lack of proper rest.
data.partBlankContent: Humans are physiological beings that require food, rest, and water to survive. As hu___ beings str___ to me__ the chall_____ of t__ workplace, th__ have fe___ free ho___ for re__ and lei____. If empl_____ are ab__ to cre___ a restful a__ relaxing wo__ environment, empl____ performance m__ increase notic_____. Employers, therefore, are in need of effective strategies to promote employee wellbeing and to reduce absenteeism due to stress from the lack of proper rest.
data.answer: 人类是生理生物，需要食物、休息和水来生存。当人类努力迎接工作场所的挑战时，他们很少有自由的爱好来休息和休闲。如果雇主能够创造一个舒适放松的工作环境，员工的表现可能会显著提高。因此，雇主需要有效的策略来提高员工的幸福感，并减少因缺乏适当休息而导致的压力缺勤。
